places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Rays Inn Boarding & Lodging

reviews.text: The lodge is bang on the Guruvayunkere main road. A good location, clean and well ventilated, well connected. Good eatery options nearby.

Room cost is only 1800 rs per day but it feels like a start hotel and the amenities are excellent.
Rooms are very clean and hygiene,  very friendly staffs. I strongly recommend this place and i would like to give 5 star rating

Most friendly and helpul receptionists and staffs ever, lovely impression of Hotel Rays Inn. Everything about the lodge was exceptional. It was clean, stylish with excellent service.
Food was good and great value for money and service was attentive.

The rooms were very good , the staffs were also very friendly and responsive , car parking space was also there , there is the restaurant beside this building in the same premises . I searched this rooms online , contacted through phonecall  and paid online , it was worth it staying here .
Best rooms and affordable prices. Great staff and service

places_with_reviews.name: NavaShakthi Residency

reviews.text: Surprisingly neat and beautiful for a small town like Guruvaynkere.. very spacious air conditioned rooms with bath facility. Had a very pleasant stay here..

Decent rooms at decent price. Good costumer services. Toilet, room bed,bed sheet, towels every thing is clean. All the employees are costumer friendly. I will recommend this residency to everyone who is searching for a place to stay here.
Good lodge with good amneties but Room rent is on higher side for a place like Guruvayana kere

Visited for a lunch , best ambience, must try egg ghee roast and egg curry which was too good. The staff who served was very kind.
Must visit resto near guruvayankere.
U can eat listening to music here which is speciality of this place.

Excellent rooms,

places_with_reviews.name: PARIKRAMA Lodging
address: ramakrishna nivas main road, X7RM+H2C, Belthangady, Karnataka 574214, India

reviews.text: Very worst place,beds n room condition is very bad n no hot water facility,even after booking the room before 3 to 4 days they will give our room to a different customers n ask us to stay in a worst room never visit

Horrible rooms and worst owner attitude.
1. First the owner didn't remember our booking, we had to wait for good 20 min to get our room.
2. Finally after getting our room, entered into stinky room and unhygienic bathrooms. The ac was stuck at 27degrees and could not be operated.
3. There were cockroaches to greet us in the room.
4. When we said 1500 is highly overrated for such poorly maintained room, the owner was so stubborn to say that for such price you get only such rooms! Previous day we stayed in Mahamaya residency (Subrahmanya) for the same price where the rooms were super clean and service was awesome.
5. The owner was not willing to agree that the rooms are not at all clean.
6. Only good thing was the room service guy who tried his best to help us with the ac and luggage.
PLEASE AVOID THIS PLACE AS THE OWNER IS HIGHLY UNGRATEFUL AND THE PLACE IS YUCK!
Bathroom was very old it was not nice overall room was desent

Don't come here at any cost even if hygine matters even 1% to you. Worst place that I have ever stayed. Washrooms are really bad. They have one good room in first floor and it's photos have been used everywhere. Lot of musquitos. Even public washrooms are better than this :(
I wish there was 0 star

Very Bad experience and worst maintenance of washroom. price also increased than discussed in phone contact. They people even don't how to deal with client. Moreover very bad experiences and rubbish people

places_with_reviews.name: OYO 72877 Fanateer Lodge
address: 01, mangalore, Mangalore - Dharmastala Hwy, Guruvayankere, Karnataka 574217, India

reviews.text:
Rooms are nice big & Parking Space. But they lack lots services, waste of money to be honest if you staying there.
1. Rooms are dusty and smells like a dust,
2. No toiletries, bath towel provided.
3. Bed covers are used, you will find lots hair and dust. Rooms are not REFRESHING
4. No WIFI
5. Breakfast/Tea/Coffee not provided, (they should at least provide tea/coffee for the guest with payment).
6. No Guest Service, no one will come to clean room or pick your garbage
7. No Water or Tea Kettle for drinking hot water
8. AC Cooling is not that great
9. No Taxi Service, they are least bothered to arrange too (below you will find tours and travels office but they were the MOST LOUSY staff, they couldn’t guide or book any tickets for our family). If you staying here, make sure you have car or other options to return to hotel etc, you wont find OLA and other taxi service there.

Instead, Pls find other place to stay, if you want to stay for night and leave next day then it’s ok to adjust but still not justified if you paying good amount!

Never thought a remote location could have such a well maintained place. Rooms were spacious, a bit of dusting was needed in the bathroom as i found a couple of spider web and a spider 😅.

They have an online UPI payment method too if just in case we run short of cash. Drinks such as water or cold drinks can be procured from the reception at additional standard cost. Food is one main concern in the hotel or surrounding as there are no proper restaurants which I can suggest.

It's pretty close to the main guruvenkere busstand so it hardly takes 5-10mins walking.
The rooms were big enough. However it needs proper maintenance. Rooms were not cleaned properly before handing it over to us. Price was on the higher side.

We went there without a booking as the number and link provided here was from OYO but they have withdrawn from Oyo. There was only a suite available and we had to take the larger room instead of a double room. Very good and big rooms. Slightly premium cost but the rooms are worth it. Would recommend staying here if cost is not a concern and comfort is important. They have parking space for about 5-6 4 wheelers.
There's a couple of clothing stores below and a gym (not part of the hotel).
The town center is walkable and there are multiple restaurants in walkable distance.
The staff at the hotel were very courteous. Even though they don't have a restaurant of their own they provided room service by ordering and picking up the food and delivering it to us at the room.
The best part was they have 24 hours checkout. It is particularly important if you are driving here and reach at odd hours.
Towels were provided, the bathroom was clean and has all modern fittings. There was a TV but didn't seem like there was a set top box. Didn't matter to us but if you need it better confirm with the front desk.
We got a suite that had a front living area and a bedroom separated by a door. Can easily accommodate 4-5 members if they allow extra beds.
Well maintained, clean rooms unexpected in a town near Dharmasthala. Good location, 24hrs check in-out facility. Families, Friends can use this.

places_with_reviews.name: SUNROCK BALIPA RESORT
address: Chandkuru Road, Kuthrottu Rd, Nadu, Belthangady, Karnataka 574214, India

reviews.text: I recently stayed at this incredible resort, and it exceeded all my expectations. The breathtaking scenery, luxurious accommodations, and impeccable service made for an unforgettable experience. The staff was not only friendly but also went above and beyond to ensure every detail was perfect. The diverse range of amenities, from facilities to gourmet dining options, catered to all preferences. I highly recommend this resort to anyone seeking a blissful retreat and can't wait to return for another memorable stay.

The resort offers a picturesque escape with breathtaking views of both the serene river and the Jamalabad fort, adding cultural charm to the stay. The swimming pool provides a refreshing retreat amidst nature's beauty. The food is delicious, reflecting local flavors, and the ambience is inviting, creating a sense of tranquility. The resort maintains a clean environment, enhancing the overall experience for guests seeking relaxation and immersion in natural surroundings.
Very good resort. Amazing scenery, good service, staffs are friendly. Many games are available to play,even swimming pool is available. It is clean and good. I was really happy during the visit

"My recent visit to Sunrock Balipa Resort was nothing short of spectacular! From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality that made me feel right at home. The resort's stunning location amidst the serene beauty of nature provided the perfect backdrop for a relaxing getaway.
The accommodations were not only luxurious but also impeccably clean and well-maintained. I particularly enjoyed waking up to the breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape every morning. The attention to detail in the room amenities truly exceeded my expectations.
One of the highlights of my stay was the exceptional service provided by the staff. They went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of my experience was perfect, from assisting with activities to recommending the best local attractions to explore.
The dining options at Sunrock Balipa Resort were equally impressive. The diverse menu offered a delightful array of culinary delights, each dish bursting with flavor and prepared with the freshest ingredients. Enjoying a meal by the poolside, every bite was a culinary delight.
Furthermore, the resort's facilities were top-notch, providing ample opportunities for both relaxation and recreation. Whether lounging by the pool, or participating in the various outdoor activities offered, there was never a dull moment during my stay.
Overall, my experience at Sunrock Balipa Resort surpassed all expectations. I left feeling rejuvenated, refreshed, and already planning my next visit. I highly recommend this resort to anyone seeking a luxurious and unforgettable getaway. Thank you to the entire team for making my stay truly memorable!"
One of the best resort I can say. They have various packages I have tried the waterfalls package it was extremely awesome 😍.in the next month or sometime I want to try other packages too.
